page.title: 07VILLAGE HALL, BROADWAY
page.content: The village hall,which is being slowly assembled will be a new hall for Broadway. The project was started in January 1985. We raised money by having fete's, car boot sales, coffee mornings, and an antique roadshow.The hall is to the north-east of the village . There are several different building materials used for our village hall.The sand and bradstone are already there and we have concrete blocks for the walls.The steel girders are already up and gravel is on the floor prior to concreting. The hall will have a big room for football,table tennis,discos,and meetings.There will also be a youth club and possibly a scout troop. It will be opened in 1986.
